room_title: Escape room "Western Bank Heist" by Locks and Puzzles Escape Room in Toms River
review: I went through the western themed room and enjoyed it thoroughly. There was a nice mix of puzzles and everyone in our group was able to participate. When you complete the room you get to ride away with the loot on a horse which was a nice finishing touch! It's a great environment and very clean! I would highly recomme
